[!exec:gpg] stop

mkhomedir
mkgpgconfig
exec find $HOME

cp golden/.encrypted $HOME
chezmoi add --debug --encrypt ~/.encrypted
exists $CHEZMOISOURCEDIR/encrypted_dot_encrypted
exec cat $CHEZMOISOURCEDIR/encrypted_dot_encrypted
! stdout plaintext

rm $HOME/.encrypted
chezmoi apply --force
cp golden/.encrypted $HOME/.encrypted

-- golden/.encrypted --
plaintext
